Text:
I've seen many copies of anime.. after a long time miniHD seemed the best compression in videos, and in good quality..
..until I came across your release, its quite unbelievable that something so good could still be so small..

I'd like you to release some anime that really good some good ratings.. like Steins;Gate (TV)
Clannad After Story (TV)
Rurouni Kenshin: Trust & Betrayal (OAV)
Fullmetal Alchemist (TV) Brotherhood
Death Note (TV) 720p
Hyouka (Detective anime)

..give a hint to ppl who follow you on what can be xpected next in ur releases.. ^_^

..my mistake, didn't see the line 'No current requests..'

either way, consider it.
Are you going to upload season 7?
Thank you for the upload and please upload Season 7-9 too. :D
